categoryDesc: Premium quality spices from Indian farms.

products.name: Turmeric
products.description: Pure and finely ground turmeric powder, perfect for cooking and health benefits.

items.name: Rajapuri-Sangli-Salem(Europe Quality/Good Grade)
items.description:
**Rajapuri Turmeric**, also known as **Sangli Turmeric**, is one of the most widely traded and commercially important turmeric varieties from Maharashtra, India. Sourced primarily from the Sangli belt, this variety is known for its **bright orange-yellow colour**, **strong natural aroma**, and **excellent dry recovery**, making it highly suitable for bulk exports and spice processing industries.

Rajapuri Sangli turmeric is a preferred choice for international buyers due to its **consistent quality**, **uniform fingers**, and **competitive pricing**, supported by the well-established **Sangli APMC market infrastructure**.

---

### Specifications
- **Botanical Name:** Curcuma longa L.
- **HS Code:** 09103020
- **Origin:** Sangli region, Maharashtra, India
- **Variety Type:** Commercial / Export Grade Turmeric

### Product Forms
- Whole Turmeric Fingers
- Single Polished
- Double Polished
- Turmeric Powder (as per mesh requirement)

### Physical Characteristics
- **Finger Appearance:** Long, bold fingers with uniform shape
- **Colour:** Bright yellow to deep orange
- **Aroma:** Strong, earthy, characteristic turmeric aroma

### Quality Parameters
- **Curcumin Content:** 2.0% – 3.5% (varies by crop & grade; lab tested on request)
- **Moisture Content:** Max 10% – 12%
- **Foreign Matter:** < 1%
- **Broken Fingers:** As per buyer specification
- **Admixture:** Nil

### Shelf Life
- **12 – 24 months** under recommended storage conditions

items.name: Marathwada Salem-(Vasnt/Waigaon)
items.description:
## Marathwada Turmeric

**Marathwada Turmeric** is sourced from the Marathwada region of Maharashtra, India, including Hingoli, Parbhani, Nanded, Latur, and Beed. This variety is known for its **stable quality**, **good colour strength**, and **competitive pricing**, making it highly suitable for **bulk trade**, **powder manufacturing**, and **industrial processing applications**.

Marathwada turmeric is widely preferred by domestic and international buyers due to its **consistent supply**, **processing-friendly characteristics**, and availability across multiple producing districts.

---

### Specifications
- **Botanical Name:** Curcuma longa L.
- **HS Code:** 09103020
- **Origin:** Marathwada region, Maharashtra, India
- **Producing Districts:** Hingoli, Parbhani, Nanded, Latur, Beed
- **Variety Type:** Commercial / Processing Grade

### Product Forms
- Whole Turmeric Fingers (Single / Double Polished)
- Bulb Turmeric (Mother Rhizome)
- Turmeric Powder (custom mesh as per requirement)

### Physical Characteristics
- **Finger Size & Appearance:** Medium to bold fingers, fairly uniform
- **Colour:** Yellow to yellow-orange
- **Aroma:** Mild to strong, characteristic turmeric aroma

### Quality Parameters
- **Curcumin Content:** Typically 2.0% – 3.5% (crop & lot dependent; lab tested on request)
- **Moisture Content:** Max 10% – 12%
- **Foreign Matter:** < 1.0%
- **Broken Fingers:** As per buyer specification
- **Admixture:** Nil
- **Total Ash:** Max 9.0%
- **Acid Insoluble Ash:** Max 1.5%

### Shelf Life
- **12 – 24 months** under cool and dry storage conditions

items.name: Nizamabad Turmeric(Telengana Origin)
items.shortDesc: High-quality Nizamabad turmeric powder from Telangana.
items.description:
## Nizamabad Turmeric

**Nizamabad Turmeric** originates from the Nizamabad district of Telangana, one of India’s oldest and most reputed turmeric-growing regions. Historically known as the **“Turmeric Bowl of India”**, this region is renowned for producing turmeric with **excellent colour value**, **good curcumin content**, and **strong acceptance in both domestic and export markets**.

Nizamabad turmeric is widely traded through regulated markets and is preferred by processors and exporters for its **balanced quality**, **stable availability**, and **competitive pricing**. It is commonly used in **bulk spice processing**, **powder manufacturing**, and **value-added turmeric products**.

---

### Specifications
- **Botanical Name:** Curcuma longa L.
- **HS Code:** 09103020
- **Origin:** Nizamabad district, Telangana, India
- **Variety Type:** Commercial / Processing Grade Turmeric

### Product Forms
- Whole Turmeric Fingers
- Single Polished
- Double Polished
- Turmeric Powder (industrial & retail grades)

### Physical Characteristics
- **Finger Appearance:** Medium to bold fingers with slightly rough surface
- **Colour:** Bright yellow to yellow-orange
- **Aroma:** Strong, slightly pungent, earthy aroma

### Quality Parameters
- **Curcumin Content:** Typically 2.5% – 4.0% (lab tested on request)
- **Moisture Content:** Max 10% – 12%
- **Foreign Matter:** < 1%
- **Broken Fingers:** As per buyer requirement
- **Admixture:** Nil

### Shelf Life
- **12 – 24 months** under proper storage conditions

items.name: Bulb Turmeric
items.description:
## Bulb (Mother Rhizome) Turmeric

**Bulb Turmeric**, also known as **Mother Rhizome Turmeric**, refers to the primary central rhizome of the turmeric plant from which finger rhizomes develop. Compared to finger turmeric, bulb turmeric is **larger, thicker, and heavier**, and is widely used in **industrial processing**, **powder manufacturing**, **extraction**, and **blending applications** due to its good colour yield and cost efficiency.

Bulb turmeric is commonly sourced from major turmeric-growing regions such as **Maharashtra**, **Telangana (Nizamabad)**, **Tamil Nadu**, and **Andhra Pradesh**, and is extensively traded in bulk for both domestic and export markets.

---

### Specifications
- **Botanical Name:** Curcuma longa L.
- **HS Code:** 09103020
- **Product Type:** Mother Rhizome / Bulb Turmeric
- **Origin:** India (Maharashtra / Telangana / Tamil Nadu – as per lot)

### Product Forms
- Whole Bulb Turmeric (Single / Double Polished)
- Bulb Turmeric Powder (industrial grade)

### Physical Characteristics
- **Bulb Size & Appearance:** Large, round to oval rhizomes with dense and heavy structure; rough surface compared to fingers
- **Colour:** Yellow to yellow-orange (lighter than finger turmeric)
- **Aroma:** Mild to moderate, characteristic turmeric aroma

### Quality Parameters
- **Curcumin Content:** Typically 1.5% – 3.0% (varies by origin and crop)
- **Moisture Content:** Max 10% – 12%
- **Foreign Matter:** < 1%
- **Broken Pieces:** As per buyer specification
- **Admixture:** Nil

### Shelf Life
- **12 – 24 months** under proper storage conditions

items.name: Lakadong Turmeric
items.shortDesc: Premium Lakadong turmeric chips and powder from Meghalaya.
items.description:
## Lakadong Turmeric

**Lakadong Turmeric** originates from the Lakadong region of Meghalaya, India, and is globally recognized as one of the **highest curcumin–containing turmeric varieties**. Owing to its **exceptional medicinal value**, **intense natural colour**, and **limited cultivation area**, Lakadong turmeric is positioned as a **premium specialty product** for **nutraceutical**, **pharmaceutical**, and **wellness-focused markets**.

Lakadong turmeric is highly sought after by buyers requiring **high curcumin content**, **strict purity standards**, and **traceable origin**, making it ideal for value-added formulations and health-oriented applications.

---

### Specifications
- **Botanical Name:** Curcuma longa L.
- **HS Code:** 09103020
- **Origin:** Lakadong region, Meghalaya, India
- **Variety Type:** High-Curcumin / Specialty Grade Turmeric

### Product Forms
- Whole Turmeric Fingers (Single / Double Polished)
- Turmeric Powder (fine & customized mesh)

### Physical Characteristics
- **Finger Size & Appearance:** Medium-sized fingers with compact and dense structure
- **Colour:** Deep, bright yellow
- **Aroma:** Strong, pungent, characteristic aroma

### Quality Parameters
- **Curcumin Content:** Typically 6.0% – 8.0% (lab-tested; COA available on request)
- **Moisture Content:** Max 8% – 10%
- **Foreign Matter:** < 0.5%
- **Broken Fingers:** As per buyer specification
- **Admixture:** Nil (100% pure turmeric)
- **Total Ash:** Max 8.0%
- **Acid Insoluble Ash:** Max 1.0%

### Shelf Life
- **12 – 24 months** under cool and dry storage conditions
